validation.email: Please enter a valid email address

toast.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.checking: Checking if your account can be deleted...
deleteAccount.onlyOwner: You are the only owner of the following companies:
deleteAccount.transferRequired: Please transfer ownership to another user before deleting your account.
deleteAccount.cancelRequired: Please cancel your subscription before deleting your account.
deleteAccount.alreadyCanceled: Subscription for {company} is already scheduled to cancel. You can delete your account once the subscription period ends.
deleteAccount.confirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone. All your personal data will be permanently removed.
deleteAccount.confirmWarning: This will permanently delete your account and all associated data. You will be logged out immediately.
deleteAccount.deletingDescription: Please wait while we delete your account...
deleteAccount.confirmCancelSubscription: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription? This action cannot be undone.

toast.deleteSuccess: Your account has been deleted successfully

transferOwnership.title: Transfer Ownership
transferOwnership.description: Select a user to transfer company ownership to. You will become a regular user after the transfer.
transferOwnership.noUsersMessage: There are no other users in your company to transfer ownership to. Please add a user first.
transferOwnership.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to transfer ownership? You will become a regular user after the transfer.

toast.selectUser: Please select a user to transfer ownership to
